author: mmusich
body:
solves #34193

#### PR description:

Addresses https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/34298#issuecomment-877796208.

#### PR validation:

Testing the script with options `--suppress-output` and `--image_plot` now succeeds, while before it wasn't.
Also passes the augmented unit tests with `scram b runtests`. 
It should be also checked in the production environment.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

NA
title: `getPayloadData.py`: fix `--suppress-output` and `--image_plot` options for Py3
